definitions.structures.abstr.algebra.monoids

Interface DiscreetMonoid

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DiscreetSemiGroup, Monoid, SemiGroup, XmlPrintable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CyclicGroup, DiscreetDomain, DiscreetField, DiscreetGroup, DiscreetRing, DiscreetSemiRing, FiniteCommutativeRing, FiniteDomain, FiniteField, FiniteGroup, FiniteMonoid, FinitePrimeField, FiniteRing
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Naturals

    public interface DiscreetMonoid
extends Monoid, DiscreetSemiGroup
    Author:
    ro A discreet monoid is a monoid that is finite or countably infinite.
